bibl.title: The Weight and Measurement of Egyptian Grains.
bibl.note: 1. The text of P. Oxy. XLIX, 3455. - 2. The weight of Egyptian wheat in Pliny and in P. Oxy. XLIX, 3455. - 3. The weight of Egyptian wheat implied by P. Lond. V, 1718. - 4. The measurement of wheat in Roman Egypt. - 5. The identification of Egyptian olyra.
bibl.seg: Rathbone Dominic W., The Weight and Measurement of Egyptian Grains.
